title: REDice
author: REDice
content: who can help me to create the template of my site. i need to correct some errors of my site with negotiable price

comments.author: HONDACD125
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on July 16, 2023, 12:45:44 PM                                                who can help me to create the template of my site. i need to correct some errors of my site with negotiable priceMy friend is doing this job and has lot if experience. if you wish, you can contact me through PM or telegram https://t.me/tiktokbazaar

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Freedom4All on July 16, 2023, 01:21:44 PMWordpress?No, it's not WordPress, based on the source page it's Laravel, and this site is a casino https://cry-ex.com/ and this is the announcement thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5458908.0 I urge you to read all the comments by members and decide if you want to work on a platform that is questionable.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on July 16, 2023, 01:49:16 PMQuote from: Freedom4All on July 16, 2023, 01:21:44 PMWordpress?No, it's not WordPress, based on the source page it's Laravel, and this site is a casino https://cry-ex.com/ and this is the announcement thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5458908.0 I urge you to read all the comments by members and decide if you want to work on a platform that is questionable.Seems OP just installed some random template downloaded from the internet on that domain. I saw some of his replies to questions about that site and judging by what can be seen on the same place, I'm not sure that the OP has a clear idea of what he wants to do there.It cannot even be claimed with certainty that he recognizes the difference between a website template and the functionality of the site.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on July 16, 2023, 01:57:50 PMQuote from: robelneo on July 16, 2023, 01:49:16 PMQuote from: Freedom4All on July 16, 2023, 01:21:44 PMWordpress?No, it's not WordPress, based on the source page it's Laravel, and this site is a casino https://cry-ex.com/ and this is the announcement thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5458908.0 I urge you to read all the comments by members and decide if you want to work on a platform that is questionable.Seems OP just installed some random template downloaded from the internet on that domain. I saw some of his replies to questions about that site and judging by what can be seen on the same place, I'm not sure that the OP has a clear idea of what he wants to do there.It cannot even be claimed with certainty that he recognizes the difference between a website template and the functionality of the site. From what I saw in the link provided and if that is the website the op is asking of the template then I advise the op to keep that template and focus on the structure and as you said the functioning of the site and not a template again. But I will like him to use horizontal instead of vertical because the scrolling down is too long. So I will want the features to appear on horizontal formated and some marquee on the home page.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on July 16, 2023, 02:22:55 PMFrom what I saw in the link provided and if that is the website the op is asking of the template then I advise the op to keep that template and focus on the structure and as you said the functioning of the site and not a template again. But I will like him to use horizontal instead of vertical because the scrolling down is too long. So I will want the features to appear on horizontal formated and some marquee on the home page. I don't think he can do that if you bought the script from a legal source there is documentation attached to it and there is support coming from the developers of the script, I wonder how he got hold of the script.The script based on the page source is on laravel The name of the template is Lottolab I don't know if this is the script that he is using, this is a sample script of lottolab from Codecanyon, there's a possibility that he is not the owner of the script we need confirmation from OP

comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on July 16, 2023, 03:40:47 PMThe name of the template is Lottolab I don't know if this is the script that he is using, this is a sample script of lottolab from Codecanyon, there's a possibility that he is not the owner of the script we need confirmation from OPThat is right. comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on July 16, 2023, 08:58:47 PMQuote from: robelneo on July 16, 2023, 03:40:47 PMThe name of the template is Lottolab I don't know if this is the script that he is using, this is a sample script of lottolab from Codecanyon, there's a possibility that he is not the owner of the script we need confirmation from OPThat is right. The website is identical to the script demo from CodeCanyon. He didn't even bother to change the colors or the demo content, such as testimonials or blog articles.https://script.viserlab.com/lottolab/He doesn't know how to properly configure a site the source is questionable because it doesn't have support if you bought a script there's always support and if he purchase it on Codecanyon and he is the real buyer then it's better to pay the developer to configure the template.I would not even think of trusting a newbie casino owner with my money if he is inexperience in how to operate a casino if there's a big issue that comes along he will have a hard time addressing it and the players are the one to suffer.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on July 16, 2023, 10:34:04 PMI would not even think of trusting a newbie casino owner with my money if he is inexperience in how to operate a casino if there's a big issue that comes along he will have a hard time addressing it and the players are the one to suffer. Resolve what actually? Is it not obvious that newbies who come up with such an idea without even knowing anything about it are all in it to make quick money from victims? That's all I could get from it. Based on my calculation, the OP might have seen and imagined how much crypto casinos are making out there and thought of making out its own casino to share some of that money, not knowing that everything is far above what it might look like to him. Real coding experience is required; paying someone entirely to do something that you have no idea about is, at some point, also dangerous, as the programmer, if not a trustworthy person, might be the one who steals the site without the real owner's knowledge.

If this is your goal in life then take your time and learn all these pieces of stuff, study first, and establish your reputation here first you are being impatient and it will blow up on you.
